recommenttext: We recommend the most popular and best NFTs to you after editor's selection
contactus: If you have any specific ideas or requirements, please contact us.
remark1: It is a non-fungible token (NFT), functions as a verifiable proofs of authenticity and ownership of digital content on MetaNet.
remark2: After buying, this NFT will be transferred to your ShowMoney Wallet. You could sign up for an account to use.
remark3: All NFT trading is settled when finished, you could not cancel the order and get a refund.
nftImageDrsc: Turn your digital photos, painting, photography, etc in into an NFT.
createtips2: By adding more details and information, your NFT will have higher perceived value and more market exposure.
createtips3: NFT information is transparent, permanent, and unalterable.
uploadTips: Upload the image you want to mint
seriesNumberPlac: Please fill in the number of series
seriesNumberTips: How many NFTs does a series contain
createSerieTips: Works have a similar style or concepts can be created in series. The total number is fixed and cannot be modified.
havedSameNameSeries: A series with the same name already exists
txidToNftFaile: This TXID content cannot be minted into NFT, please fill in other TXID
nftCopyrightDrsc: Turn the Right to Profit of your intellectual property into an NFT. When you sell the NFT, the buyer will get the right to profit.

tagCreateTx: When TX casting NFT, the type is determined by the content of TX, not selectable

metaBotDrsc: MetaID's first functional NFT, the unique identity of MetaID and MetaNet supporters
tariffDescription1cont: Seller's Income is the price set by the seller. For example, if the sales price is 1 BSV, the seller's income after the NFT transaction is 1 BSV Transaction Fees: 5% of the price set by the seller. For example, the sales price of one NFT is 1 BSV, then the Transaction Fee is 0.05 BSV Buyer’s Spending: NFT sales price + Transaction Fees+ miner fees. For example, if one NFT pricing is 1 BSV, then the miner fee is 0.0002 BSV, transaction fee 0.05, total buyer’s spending is 1.0502 BSV
tariffDescription2cont: Note: NFT Listing Fee (NFT Sell) is about 10,000 Satoshi. If the miner’s fee has dramatically change, the listing fee will be adjusted accordingly.  The total cost of the user to list an NFT is the miner's fee + 10,000 Satoshi
tariffDescription3cont: Note: Generally the miner fee for unlisting is about 20,000 Satoshi, so the total user downlisting fee is miner fee (20,000 Satoshi) + 10,000 Satoshi
tariffDescription4cont: Conditions: Users need to hold at least 10,000 MC (Temporary) to mint.  General minting an NFT will costs 20,000-40,000 Satoshi miner’s fee, so the user needs to pay about 30,000-50,000 Satoshi in total.
buySellTxIdFail: Can't get SellTxId, please try again later

auctionPriceplac: Set the starting price, not less than
auctionFailTips: If the bid fails, the funds will be returned within 1 minute

countryFairIntro: The NFTs sold on the Market are works that have not been certified by the NFTonShow Officials, Users are requested to trade carefully.
countryFairTips: Instructions for using the NFT Market
countryFairTipsContent: The works in the market are not certified, please be careful when buying
buyFeeTips: The platform will charge a handling fee
countryFairTipsContent1: NFTonShow is a peer-to-peer trading market, and the Market is where NFTonShow displays all non-officially certified NFTs, which means that anyone can mint and sell NFTs in here.
countryFairTipsContent4: before using it. Once the NFT is put on the Market and purchased, it means that you agree to the terms and bear responding responsibilities and risks.
countryFairTipsContent5: We will actively review all types of NFTs, and once we find any illegal content, we will delete them immediately. We also remind you to be cautious when trading, NFTonShow will not be responsible for the non-platform fault.
countryFairTipsContent6:
We welcome outstanding creators to join NFTonShow. We will provide official certification services and open up original cooperation methods to help your work gain maximum market recognition. 
click to read
termsOfUseTitle1: NOS casting and shelf NFT specification
certSystemIntroCont1: NFTonShow certification is open for all MetaID users to apply. It requires KYC and verifies that the user names will not infringe the copyright or cause confusion. Special attention will also be paid to the copyright issue of the work by the certified creators.
certSystemIntroCont2: wPay, as the commercial operator of NFTonShow, does to minimize the infringement issue of the market content. It is a platform-based certification, not a MetaID-based certification. Moreover, this certification is more for artistic and physical NFTs, and most of the future functional NFTs do not require certification. This certification does not represent ShowPay's recognition of the value of the account or the work, and the users must bear the investment risk by themselves.
certSystemIntroCont3:
The ShowPay certification on NOS is one of the methods that ShowPay, as the commercial operator of NOS, does to minimize the infringement of platform content. It is a platform-based certification, not a MetaId-based certification. 
Moreover, this certification is more for artistic and physical NFTs, and most of the future functional NFTs do not require certification. 
This certification does not represent ShowPay's recognition of the value of the account or the work, and the user must bear the investment risk by himself.

networkTimeout: Network timed out, please try again later
certSystemIntroCont1ques: What is an NFTonShow Creator Certification?
certSystemIntroCont4: All NFTonShow certified creators must strictly abide by the
certSystemIntroCont6: . If they violate the regulations, they shall bear the relevant responsibilities. We will remove or block relevant works once we found any infringement happen. If the circumstances are serious, the certification will be canceled.
certSystemIntroCont7: 1. The NFT itself and the original proof of the work
certSystemIntroCont8: Picture of the work (more than three pictures). The work must be original to ensure that there is no copyright infringement.
certSystemIntroCont9: Proof of Originality. A screenshot of the source file, which contains the creation date.
certSystemIntroCont10: The appliers must strictly abide by the "NFTonShow Terms of Service"
certSystemIntroCont11: 2. A photo of Your ID card
certSystemIntroCont16: 4. A selfie with a piece of paper with your MetaID
certSystemIntroCont17: 5. Any other supplementary materials (such as academic certificates, real estate certificates, bank cards, etc.)
certSystemIntroCont18: 6. Package all the materials and sent them to the official Telegram account (#showpayadmin) for review.
